Question 58 
 
  
[Fluid Mechanics : Fluid Dynamics] 
 
 
A 
2 m 1.5 m

 tank of 6 m height is provided with a 100 mm diameter orifice at the center of its base. The 
orifice is plugged and the tank is filled up to 5 m height. Consider the average value of discharge 
coefficient as 0.6 and acceleration due to gravity (g) as
2
10 m/s
 . After unplugging the orifice, the time (in 
seconds) taken for the water level to drop from 5 m to 3.5 m under free discharge condition is 
____________ (rounded off to 2 decimal places). 
Ans. 102.00 to 106.00
